wikitext.*:
The '''Sociedad Tolkien Peruana''' (Spanish: "Peruvian Tolkien Society"), or '''STP''' is a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] based in [[wikipedia:Peru|Peru]]. It was founded on [[3 January|January 3]], [[2001]], on the 118th birthday of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. It has two [[The Tolkien Society#Smials|smials]], one for the North (Tumbes) and one for the South (Arequipa). The Society's main activities include the yearly ''Máratulda Vinyë Meldorinna'', ''Bilbo & Frodo Rally'' and ''Gran Concilio'', of which the fourth was held on [[4 April|April 4]], [[2009]].

As off 2023 it appears to be active. Although it's official website has not been updated since 2009 it's Facebook activity page shows activity in 2023.<ref>https://www.facebook.com/groups/26898026577/events/</ref>
